narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Going the Extra Mile LLC is a Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Phoenix, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $27.2M in Medicaid payments across 21K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $27.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
